Package com.guinetik.hexafun.examples.tui

Class Ansi

java.lang.Object
com.guinetik.hexafun.examples.tui.Ansi
public final class Ansi extends Object
ANSI escape code utilities for terminal styling. No external dependencies - pure Java terminal control.

Usage: 


 import static com.guinetik.hexafun.examples.tui.Ansi.*;

 System.out.println(color("Hello", GREEN, BOLD));
 System.out.println(color(center("Title", 40), BG_BLUE, WHITE));
